description: This tool lets you play with the COTI blockchain right from your AI assistant.

tools.name: create_account
tools.title: Create Account
tools.description: Create a new COTI account with a randomly generated private key and AES key. Returns the new account details for the AI assistant to track in conversation context. The AI should remember these credentials for use in subsequent operations.

network.description: Network to create account for: 'testnet' or 'mainnet' (required).

tools.name: decrypt_value
tools.title: Decrypt Value
tools.description: Decrypt a value using a COTI AES key. The AI assistant should pass the private key from context. Returns the decrypted value.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

tools.name: get_current_network
tools.title: Get Current Network
tools.description: Get the currently configured COTI network (testnet or mainnet). The AI assistant should track and pass the current network context. If no network is provided, defaults to testnet.

network.description: The current network context (tracked by AI assistant). Defaults to 'testnet' if not provided.

tools.name: get_current_rpc
tools.title: Get Current RPC
tools.description: Get the RPC URL for the specified COTI network (testnet or mainnet). Returns the RPC endpoint currently being used for blockchain interactions.

network.description: Network to get RPC URL for: 'testnet' or 'mainnet' (required).

tools.name: encrypt_value
tools.title: Encrypt Value
tools.description: Encrypt a value using a COTI AES key. This is used for encrypting values to be sent to another address for private transactions. The AI assistant should pass the private key from context. Returns the encrypted value.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

function_selector.description: Function selector. To get the function selector, use the keccak256 hash of the function signature. For instance, for the transfer function of an ERC20 token, the function selector is '0xa9059cbb'.

tools.name: generate_aes_key
tools.title: Generate AES Key
tools.description: Generate or recover an AES key for a COTI account. Requires the account to be funded. The AI assistant should track the returned AES key for use in private transactions.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

tools.name: import_account_from_private_key
tools.title: Import Account From Private Key
tools.description: Import a COTI account using only a private key. The public key will be derived automatically, and the AES key placeholder will be set (fund the account to generate a real AES key).

private_key.description: The private key of the account to import (with or without 0x prefix).

tools.name: sign_message
tools.title: Sign Message
tools.description: Sign a message using a COTI private key. This creates a cryptographic signature that proves the message was signed by the owner of the private key. The AI assistant should pass the private key from context. Returns the signature.

private_key.description: Private key to sign with (tracked by AI from previous operations)

tools.name: switch_network
tools.title: Switch Network
tools.description: Switch between COTI testnet and mainnet networks. The AI assistant should remember this network selection and pass it to subsequent blockchain operations. Returns the new network to be tracked by the AI.

network.description: Network to switch to - either 'testnet' or 'mainnet'

previous_network.description: The previous network (from AI context). Defaults to 'testnet' if not provided.

tools.name: verify_signature
tools.title: Verify Signature
tools.description: Verify a message signature and recover the address that signed it. This is used to determine who signed a specific message. Requires the original message and the signature as input. Returns the address that created the signature.

tools.name: compile_contract
tools.title: Compile Solidity Contract
tools.description: Compiles Solidity source code without deploying it to the blockchain. Returns bytecode, ABI, and compilation metadata (compiler version, EVM version, optimization settings). Useful for: - Testing that a contract compiles without errors - Getting the ABI for contract interaction - Analyzing bytecode size and structure - Preparing compilation metadata for later deployment or verification - Debugging compilation issues in isolation

contract_name.description: Name of the contract to compile (auto-detected from source if not provided)

solidity_source.description: Complete Solidity source code to compile

tools.name: compile_and_deploy_contract
tools.title: Compile and Deploy Contract
tools.description: Compiles Solidity source code and immediately deploys it to the COTI blockchain in a single operation. This tool avoids bytecode truncation issues that can occur when passing large bytecode strings between tools. Accepts full Solidity source code, compiles it, and deploys the result. Returns the contract address, transaction hash, and ABI (for future interactions). This is the recommended tool for most deployment scenarios.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the deployment transaction

auto_verify.description: Automatically verify contract on CotiScan after deployment (default: false)

private_key.description: Private key of the deployer account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

license_type.description: License type for verification (default: 'mit', only used if auto_verify is true)

contract_name.description: Name of the contract to compile (auto-detected if not provided)

solidity_source.description: Complete Solidity source code to compile and deploy

constructor_params.description: Array of constructor parameters in order (e.g., ["TokenName", "TKN", 18]). Leave empty if no constructor parameters.

tools.name: approve_erc20_spender
tools.title: Approve ERC20 Spender
tools.description: Approve another address to spend tokens on behalf of the owner. This is used for allowing another address (like a contract) to transfer your tokens. Requires token contract address, spender address, and amount as input. Returns the transaction hash upon successful approval.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the transaction

amount_wei.description: Amount of tokens to approve (in Wei)

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

spender_address.description: Address to approve as spender, e.g., 0x0D7C5C1DA069fd7C1fAFBeb922482B2C7B15D273

tools.name: deploy_private_erc20_contract
tools.title: Deploy Private ERC20 Contract
tools.description: Deploy a new standard private ERC20 token contract on the COTI blockchain. This creates a new private token with the specified name, symbol, and decimals. Returns the deployed contract address upon successful deployment.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the token (0-6)

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the deployment transaction

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

tools.name: get_private_erc20_allowance
tools.title: Get ERC20 Allowance
tools.description: Check how many tokens a spender is allowed to use. This is used for checking the current allowance a spender has for an owner's tokens. Requires token contract address, owner address, and spender address as input. Returns the allowance amount.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

spender_address.description: Address of the spender to check allowance for

tools.name: get_private_erc20_balance
tools.title: Get Private ERC20 Token Balance
tools.description: Get the balance of a private ERC20 token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking the current balance of a private token for a COTI account. Requires a COTI account address and token contract address as input. Returns the decrypted token balance.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: get_private_erc20_decimals
tools.title: Get Private ERC20 Decimals
tools.description: Get the number of decimals for a private ERC20 token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking the number of decimals in this token. Requires token contract address as input. Returns the number of decimals in this contract.

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: get_private_erc20_total_supply
tools.title: Get Private ERC20 Total Supply
tools.description: Get the total supply of tokens for a private ERC20 token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking how many tokens have been minted in this token. Requires token contract address as input. Returns the total number of tokens in this contract.

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: mint_private_erc20_token
tools.title: Mint Private ERC20 Token
tools.description: Mint additional private ERC20 tokens on the COTI blockchain. This adds new tokens to the specified recipient address. Returns the transaction hash upon successful minting.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the minting transaction

amount_wei.description: Amount of tokens to mint in wei (smallest unit)

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

recipient_address.description: Address to receive the minted tokens

tools.name: transfer_private_erc20
tools.description: Transfer private ERC20 tokens on the COTI blockchain. This is used for sending private tokens from your wallet to another address. Requires token contract address, recipient address, and amount as input. Returns the transaction hash upon successful transfer.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the transaction

amount_wei.description: Amount of tokens to transfer (in Wei)

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC20 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: approve_private_erc721
tools.title: Approve Private ERC721
tools.description: Approve an address to transfer a specific private ERC721 NFT token on the COTI blockchain. This allows the approved address to transfer the specified NFT on behalf of the owner. Requires token contract address, token ID, and spender address as input. Returns the transaction hash upon successful approval.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

token_id.description: ID of the NFT token to approve for transfer

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the transaction

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

spender_address.description: Address to approve as spender, e.g., 0x0D7C5C1DA069fd7C1fAFBeb922482B2C7B15D273

tools.name: deploy_private_erc721_contract
tools.title: Deploy Private ERC721 Contract
tools.description: Deploy a new standard private ERC721 NFT contract on the COTI blockchain. This creates a new private NFT collection with the specified name and symbol. Returns the deployed contract address upon successful deployment.

symbol.description: Symbol of the NFT collection (typically 3-5 characters)

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the deployment transaction

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

tools.name: get_private_erc721_approved
tools.title: Get Private ERC721 Approved
tools.description: Get the approved address for a private ERC721 NFT token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking which address is currently approved to transfer a specific NFT. Requires token contract address and token ID as input. Returns the address that is approved to transfer the specified NFT.

token_id.description: ID of the NFT token to check approval for

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: get_private_erc721_balance
tools.title: Get Private ERC721 Balance
tools.description: Get the balance of a private ERC721 NFT collection on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking how many NFTs an address owns in a collection. Requires token contract address and account address as input. Returns the number of NFTs owned by the specified address.

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: get_private_erc721_is_approved_for_all
tools.title: Get Private ERC721 Is Approved For All
tools.description: Check if an operator is approved to transfer all private ERC721 NFT tokens on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking if an operator has been granted approval to manage all NFTs owned by an address. Requires token contract address, owner address, and operator address as input. Returns whether the operator is approved for all NFTs.

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

operator_address.description: Address of the operator to check approval for

tools.name: get_private_erc721_token_owner
tools.title: Get Private ERC721 Token Owner
tools.description: Get the owner address of a private ERC721 NFT token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking who currently owns a specific NFT. Requires token contract address and token ID as input. Returns the owner's address of the specified NFT.

token_id.description: ID of the NFT token to check ownership for

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: get_private_erc721_token_uri
tools.title: Get Private ERC721 Token URI
tools.description: Get the tokenURI for a private ERC721 NFT token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for retrieving the metadata URI of a private NFT. Requires token contract address and token ID as input. Returns the decrypted tokenURI.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

token_id.description: ID of the NFT token to get the URI for

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: get_private_erc721_total_supply
tools.title: Get Private ERC721 Total Supply
tools.description: Get the total supply of tokens for a private ERC721 NFT collection on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking how many NFTs have been minted in a collection. Requires token contract address as input. Returns the total number of tokens in the collection.

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: mint_private_erc721_token
tools.title: Mint Private ERC721 Token
tools.description: Mint a new private ERC721 NFT token on the COTI blockchain. This creates a new NFT in the specified collection with the provided token URI. Returns the transaction hash and token ID upon successful minting.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the minting transaction

token_uri.description: URI for the token metadata (can be IPFS URI or any other URI), Example: "https://example.com/token/0"

to_address.description: Address to receive the minted NFT

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

tools.name: set_private_erc721_approval_for_all
tools.title: Set Private ERC721 Approval For All
tools.description: Approve or revoke an operator to transfer all private ERC721 NFT tokens on the COTI blockchain. This allows the operator to transfer any NFT owned by the caller in this collection. Requires token contract address, operator address, and approval status as input. Returns the transaction hash upon successful approval setting.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

approved.description: Whether to approve (true) or revoke (false) the operator

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the transaction

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

operator_address.description: Address to approve as operator, e.g., 0x0D7C5C1DA069fd7C1fAFBeb922482B2C7B15D273

tools.name: transfer_private_erc721
tools.title: Transfer Private ERC721 Token
tools.description: Transfer a private ERC721 NFT token on the COTI blockchain. This is used for sending a private NFT from your wallet to another address. Requires token contract address, recipient address, and token ID as input. Returns the transaction hash upon successful transfer.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

token_id.description: ID of the NFT token to transfer

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the transaction

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

from_address.description: Optional, address to transfer from. If not provided, the current account will be used.

token_address.description: ERC721 token contract address on COTI blockchain

use_safe_transfer.description: Optional, whether to use safeTransferFrom instead of transferFrom. Default is false.

tools.name: call_contract_function
tools.title: Call Contract Function
tools.description: Call any function on a smart contract on the COTI blockchain. Supports both read-only (view/pure) functions and state-changing (write) functions. Read-only functions return data without creating a transaction. State-changing functions create transactions and may require gas_limit. Returns the function result in a human-readable format.

abi.description: Optional JSON string representation of the contract ABI. If not provided, will attempt to use standard ERC20/ERC721 ABIs.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for state-changing functions. Not needed for read-only functions.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

function_args.description: Array of arguments to pass to the function (can be empty if function takes no arguments)

function_name.description: Name of the function to call on the contract

contract_address.description: Address of the smart contract to call

tools.name: decode_event_data
tools.title: Decode Event Data
tools.description: Decode event data from a transaction log based on the event signature. This helps interpret the raw data in transaction logs by matching the event signature to known event types and decoding the parameters. Requires event signature, topics, and data from a transaction log.

abi.description: Optional JSON string representation of the contract ABI. If not provided, will attempt to use standard ERC20/ERC721 ABIs.

data.description: Data field from the transaction log

topics.description: Array of topics from the transaction log

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

tools.name: get_transaction_status
tools.title: Get Transaction Status
tools.description: Get the status of a transaction on the COTI blockchain. This is used for checking if a transaction has been confirmed, pending, or failed. Requires a transaction hash as input. Returns detailed information about the transaction status.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

transaction_hash.description: Transaction hash to check status for

tools.name: get_transaction_logs
tools.title: Get Transaction Logs
tools.description: Get the logs from a transaction on the COTI blockchain. This is used for retrieving event logs emitted during transaction execution. Requires a transaction hash as input. Returns detailed information about the transaction logs including event names, topics, and data.

aes_key.description: AES key for private transactions (tracked by AI). Required for private operations.

private_key.description: Private key of the account (tracked by AI from previous operations)

transaction_hash.description: Transaction hash to get logs for

tools.name: get_native_balance
tools.title: Get Native Balance
tools.description: Get the native COTI token balance of a COTI blockchain account. This is used for checking the current balance of a COTI account. Returns the account balance in COTI tokens.

tools.name: transfer_native
tools.title: Transfer Native
tools.description: Transfer native COTI tokens to another wallet. This is used for sending COTI tokens from your wallet to another address. Requires private key, recipient address, and amount in Wei as input. The AI assistant should track and pass the account private key from context. Returns the transaction hash upon successful transfer.

gas_limit.description: Optional gas limit for the transaction

amount_wei.description: Amount of COTI to transfer (in Wei)

private_key.description: Private key of the sender account (tracked by AI from previous import/generate operations)
